data.name: WEEK 10 CIRCLE: White Lies
data.description:
WEEK 10 CIRCLE: WHITE LIES

Hi everyone,

NOTE: Only those who have already purchased SU Week 10 Circling + POP Tickets can select going, if you select going without having a ticket, you unfortunately cannot attend.

We’re proud to announce our week 10 POP circle in the lower atrium of the SU, and the theme is white lies!

This means that you will need to come in a white T-shirt with a lie about yourself written on it!

Failure to do so means you will be punished :)

This circle will start at 7:30 promptly but exec will be there from 7:15. This circle will be inside the lower atrium of the SU, therefore you I’ll need to purchase a week 10 circling ticket to join!

If you would like to come along, please put going for numbers!

data.name: Meet your co-founder
data.place: The Climb in the Junction (Same building as Esports Centre & PG Hub)
data.description: Bring out the entrepreneur in you! Join us on the 7th of December for a fully in-person networking session, where people from all kinds of backgrounds will be able to exchange ideas they have for a start-up and hopefully match with others that possess the right skills to help. No matter whether you already have a business idea or are looking for one, this event will let you find colleagues who excel in different fields and build your future dream team. We are partnering up with some of the biggest societies on campus to make sure you find the right person for your start-up! Stay tuned to find out more.
